definition: pannier/double basket slung across pack animal

sentences.english: So the big rabbit sat on his hind feet. He reached the top of the basket.
sentences.chinese: 於是，大兔子用後腿站起來，這樣就夠着了筐的上沿。

sentences.english: We had to fill up each mu of terraced fields with thousands of basketfuls of good soil.
sentences.chinese: 每畝梯田我們得填上成千上萬筐好土。

sentences.english: After watching the red-dressed women walk by, I went to the rooftop and watched workers weave wastebaskets.
sentences.chinese: 看那羣紅衣女郎走過，我爬上屋頂看工人們編垃圾筐。

sentences.english: Take for example a shopping basket and the product SKUs inside the basket.
sentences.chinese: 舉個例子，一個購物筐和在購物筐中的產品SKU碼。

sentences.english: Take for example a shopping basket and the product SKUs inside the basket.
sentences.chinese: 舉個例子，一個購物筐和在購物筐中的產品SKU碼。

sentences.english: After watching the red-dressed women walk by, I went to the rooftopwatched workers weave wastebaskets .
sentences.chinese: 看那羣紅衣女郎走過，我爬上屋頂看工人們編垃圾筐。

sentences.english: Darius took the ball from the official, looked at the basket, and calmly shot the ball.
sentences.chinese: 達利斯從裁判手中接過球，看着籃球筐，平靜地射球。

sentences.english: In the bucket is a yellow-black human hand.
sentences.chinese: 筐裏是一隻黃裏透黑的人手。

sentences.english: Workers carry building materials in buckets at the end of long poles.
sentences.chinese: 工人們用扁擔和筐挑運建築材料。

sentences.english: Early empirical studies have proved that the in-basket test had moderate evidence for criterion-related validity.
sentences.chinese: 早期的研究證明公文筐測驗具有較好的效標關聯效度。

sentences.english: Moon bright fills in the basket full.
Moon bright fills in the basket full.
There are sixteen apples in the basket.
Inky hands stretched out to their precious, digging, pawing and seizing their gabions.
sentences.chinese: 兩手伸出似墨染，又刨又抓又扶筐。

sentences.english: There once was a top and a small ball in a big toy box.
sentences.chinese: 從前，在小男孩的玩具筐裏有一隻陀螺和一個球。

sentences.english: There are eighteen apples in the basket.

definition: a basket carried on the back
